refnamediv.refpurpose: Class for modulating and demodulation of OFDM signals using the FFT.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: Output = ofdm_mod(int inNfft, int inNcp, int inNupsample=1, const cvec &input)

simplelist.member: Nfft - The size of the FFT. Nfft >= 2
Ncp - The length of the cyclic prefix. Ncp must be >=0 and <=Nfft
input - Modulate complex data symbols. Length of input must be an integer multiple of Nfft.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
Class for modulating and demodulation of OFDM signals using the FFT.
The modulated signal is normalized taking into account the cyclic prefix.
